message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a little steep for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $60 for it.
I can see you're a savvy negotiator, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. However,  $110 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend.  How about we settle at $70? That seems like a fair compromise.

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $95. I'm getting close to my minimum price, so this is as low as I can go.
